title: Marvel Zombies: A Zombicide Game
description: Play as zombified Marvel heroes in cooperative missions against humanity.

expansions.title: X-Men Resistance
expansions.description: Expansion introducing the X-Men as new playable characters and additional missions.

expansions.title: Clash of the Sinister Six
expansions.description: Adds the Sinister Six as enemies and allows playing with a seventh player.

expansions.title: Hydra Resurrection
expansions.description: Hail Hydra! Zombies raise the conflict between S.H.I.E.L.D. and Hydra to new heights.

expansions.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Set
expansions.description: Battle Zombie Thanos with more characters both living and undead.

expansions.title: Fantastic 4: Under Siege
expansions.description: Take part in the last stand of the Fantastic 4 against the zombie Dr. Doom.
